con:testCase.name: Verify BE IBAN
con:testCase.con:description:
Implementation of following site https://www.ibanbic.be http://www.ibanbic.be/IBANBIC.asmx?WSDL
IBAN examples http://criticaltester.com/test-data/iban-values-testing/ https://www.tuxx.be/nl/betalingsverkeer/iban_voorbeelden/
SOAPUI documentation: https://www.soapui.org/apidocs/index.html

con:property.con:name: IBANBICAboutValue
con:property.con:value: XML Webservice to convert any Belgian Bank Account (BBAN) number to the new IBAN and BIC code. (c) 2018 MDSsoft bvba - Mathieu De Smet.
